sentences.en: As you listen to it, let your face contort and express the music.
sentences.cn: 当你听它的时候, 让你的脸扭曲并表达音乐.

sentences.en: His face contorts as he screams out the lyrics.
sentences.cn: 当他大声朗读这些抒情诗时，脸都变形了。

sentences.en: How would he contort himself to give viewers the impression of audible sound?
sentences.cn: 他怎么控制他自己并把听见的声音的印象留给观众?

sentences.en: I didn't care how much I had to contort my body and my principles.
sentences.cn: 我毫不顾及自己的身体和原则被怎样扭曲.

sentences.en: Load of gear box can be decided by measuring of low speed shaft contort.
sentences.cn: 边缘传动磨机系统,可以通过实测低速轴的扭矩来确定系统中减速机的负载状况.

sentences.en: Some peoples mouths open. Others faces contort.
sentences.cn: 有些人嘴巴张开, 另一些人面部扭曲.

sentences.en: The gentlest of her caresses would contort his already tense body.
sentences.cn: 她最温柔的爱抚会让他已然紧绷的身体变得扭曲。

sentences.en: You face has 9 muscles beneath your skin that you contort, flex, and move.
sentences.cn: 你的脸部皮肤下有9块可以扭曲 、 弯曲和运动的肌肉.

trans.tran_en: if you contort something, or if it contorts, it twists out of its normal shape and looks strange or unattractive
